headline.main: MASSACHUSETTS.; Execution of McGee--The Masonic Celebration-Agassiz not to Leave Here-Talk of Reviving Know-Nothingism--Mr. Sumner's Illess-The Congressional Districts-- The North Bridge Movement, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: McGEE, or McKIE, who killed Mr. WALKER, at the Charlestown State Prison, eighteen months ago, was hanged yesterday in Suffolk County Jail, at two minutes past 10 o'clock A. M., precisely. There was a select party of four hundred persons present to see the "spectacle," and I must suppose they enjoyed it, for no one not forced by duty to "assist" at such a proceeding would attend it unless his nature is essentially brutal.

docs.snippet: DATH OP TWO DISTINGUISHED PHILADELPHIANS. The Hon. ROBERT T. CONRAD died at his residerive in West Philadelphia, on Sunday evening. His illness was short and its fatal termination quite unexpected. Judge CONBAD was a native of Philadelphia, his birth...
docs.lead_paragraph: DATH OP TWO DISTINGUISHED PHILADELPHIANS. The Hon. ROBERT T. CONRAD died at his residerive in West Philadelphia, on Sunday evening. His illness was short and its fatal termination quite unexpected. Judge CONBAD was a native of Philadelphia, his birth having occurred about 1807.

headline.main: IMPORTANT FROM UTAH.; INTERESTING MISCELLANEOUS NEWS. Notes of the Route Between the Missouri River and the Salt Lake Valley. Arrival and Reception of the Peace Commissioners. A Week Later from Camp Scott and Salt Lake City. Incidents of Gov. Cumming's Interview with the Mormons. ATTEMPTS AT INTIMIDATION BY THE SAINTS.

docs.snippet: By the arrival of the R. M. steamship Arabia at Halifax yesterday, from Liverpool on the 19th inst., we hare three days' later advices from Europe than were brought by the Ariel and sent ashore at Cape Race. The Arabia, on the 23d, passed a...
docs.lead_paragraph: By the arrival of the R. M. steamship Arabia at Halifax yesterday, from Liverpool on the 19th inst., we hare three days' later advices from Europe than were brought by the Ariel and sent ashore at Cape Race. The Arabia, on the 23d, passed a ship-of-war, supposed to be the Niagara, steering towards the rendezvous of the Telegraph Squadron in mid-ocean.

docs.snippet: The Board of Health met yesterday afternoon, Mayor TIEMANN in the Chair. A resolution was offered by Councilman BRADY, to the effect that, as the keeping of swine in the City in large numbers is a nuisance, the City Inspector be authorized to remove...

headline.main: THE BOARD OF HEALTH.; Majority and Minority Reports on Swill-Milk.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Board of Health met yesterday afternoon, Mayor TIEMANN in the Chair. A resolution was offered by Councilman BRADY, to the effect that, as the keeping of swine in the City in large numbers is a nuisance, the City Inspector be authorized to remove all swine congregated in larger numbers than four on a single lot of ground.

docs.snippet: The greater part of the vessels of the Home Squadron have already reached our coasts, and are cruising diligently about the Gulf in search of the offending Britishers. The Wabash saw the Vice-Admiral. In Jamaica, and received from him every assurance...

headline.main: FROM CUBA AND THE GULF.; The American Cruisers--Where they Are, and What they are Doing--Further Details of News.

docs.lead_paragraph: The greater part of the vessels of the Home Squadron have already reached our coasts, and are cruising diligently about the Gulf in search of the offending Britishers. The Wabash saw the Vice-Admiral. In Jamaica, and received from him every assurance of the speedy cessation of further visits from Her Majesty's cruisers, accompanied with the positive denial of said cruisers having received orders to search any American vessels.
